overview.description: Bihar, located in eastern India, is a cradle of ancient history and spirituality, home to the birthplace of Buddhism and Jainism. Established as a state on January 26, 1950, it boasts historical sites like Bodh Gaya and Patna, the capital.

top_destinations.name: Bodh Gaya
top_destinations.description: A UNESCO site where Gautama Buddha attained enlightenment.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit the Mahabodhi Temple; carry comfortable shoes.

top_destinations.name: Patna
top_destinations.description: The capital city with historical sites like Golghar and Patna Museum.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Explore local markets; visit during Chhath Puja.

top_destinations.name: Nalanda
top_destinations.description: Home to the ancient Nalanda University ruins and a major Buddhist center.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Hire a guide; carry water and sunscreen.

accommodation.name: Hotel Taj Darbar
accommodation.description: Luxurious stay near Bodh Gaya Temple.

accommodation.name: The Panache Hotel
accommodation.description: Premium hotel in Patna with modern amenities.

culinary_delights.name: Bhojnalaya
culinary_delights.description: Famous for litti chokha and traditional meals.

culinary_delights.name: The Salt
culinary_delights.description: Variety of dishes with a modern twist.

culinary_delights.name: Café Coffee Day
culinary_delights.description: Cozy spot for coffee and snacks.

must_visit_spots.name: Mahabodhi Temple
must_visit_spots.description: A UNESCO site where Buddha attained enlightenment.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit during Buddha Purnima for a spiritual experience.

must_visit_spots.name: Vishwa Shanti Stupa
must_visit_spots.description: A peace pagoda offering serene views in Rajgir.
must_visit_spots.tip: Climb early morning for a peaceful visit.

must_visit_spots.name: Golghar
must_visit_spots.description: A historical granary with a panoramic view of Patna.

must_visit_spots.name: Vaishali
must_visit_spots.description: An ancient city with Buddhist and Jain significance.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit the Ashokan Pillar and museum.

must_visit_spots.name: Gaya
must_visit_spots.description: A major pilgrimage site for Hindus and Buddhists.
must_visit_spots.tip: Explore Vishnupad Temple and perform pind daan.

must_visit_spots.name: Rajgir
must_visit_spots.description: Known for hot springs and ancient ruins.
must_visit_spots.tip: Take the ropeway to Shanti Stupa.

travel_essentials.how_to_reach: By road: Patna is 500 km from Kolkata (NH19, 10-12 hrs). By train: Patna Junction connects major cities. By air: Jay Prakash Narayan Airport (Patna).
travel_essentials.tips: Carry light clothing; respect religious sites.
